title: Star Voyager: exploring space on screen
abstract: Indulge your imagination in these flights of extra-terrestrial fancy.
description: In conjunction with the 'Star Voyager: exploring space on screen' exhibition at ACMI, the Australian Mediatheque is proud to present this compilation of early short films on outer space. This curated package includes work by cinematic pioneer Georges Melies and some of the American works he influenced.
member_object: Title; B1004320; L'Eclipse du Soleil en Pleine Lune; Active; 1907
Title; B2002438; A Trip to Mars; Active; 1910
Title; B1001895; A Trip to the moon = Le Voyage dans la lune; Active; 1902
